summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2414, for the improvement of Newport Avenue from Grand Avenue to 38th Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks, concrete stairways, cross walks, and temporary wood walks, and providing for the necessary surface drainage,, under Ordinance No. 26359 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
